Dissertation (12 MC) IE4100: B.Eng. Dissertation (12 MC) ME4101: B.Eng. Dissertation (12 MC) CE4104: B.Eng. Dissertation (8 MC) ESE4502: B.Eng. Dissertation (12 MC) MLE4101: B.Eng. Dissertation (12 MC)
ModuleDescription: In this module, students will conduct and continue a multiyear project over 2 semesters to deliver an integrated engineering solution to self-defined challenging problems. Students will implement knowledge and skills that they have gained throughout their study in their earlier years.
